Room.Name: Entrance to Eldritch's Tomb
Room.ShortDescription: You get a feeling of immensity from standing before the tomb.
Room.LongDescription: Great white pillars surround the entrance to Eldritch's Tomb. There is a cosmic aura about this place, like it is etherially connected with another plane of existance. It could be your imagination, but every now and then, you feel blessed, perhaps by Eldritch himself.
